entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Joliette
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
